resources.string:
Environment variables:

  • DATA_DIR — default persistent data directory
  • PROTECTED_DATA_DIR — default device-protected persistent data directory (set if available)
  • SHARED_DATA_DIR — directory on the primary shared/external storage device where the application can place persistent files it owns (set if available)
  • EXTERNAL_DATA_DIR — an alias to SHARED_DATA_DIR
  • PUBLIC_DATA_DIR — the primary shared/external storage directory (set if available)
  • LIB_DIR — native binaries path
  • APP_ID — application id

Commands:

  • $LIB_DIR/libtermsh.so — a tool to use Android functionality from the shell. Run with help command for details.
